The Idea

01

Inspired by the rapid technology evolution our day and age has

developed for to use phones and mobile apps constantly through our

productive day.

VOTLY
 
came in to use our technological evolution to better
 
serve the

community
 
by focusing on providing the
 
polling service
 
in a

completely new way that is better than the current classic methods
.

By building a
 
Sophisticated Community
 
based on collecting opinions,

sharing them, putting up surveys and voting on them in a
 
social

interactive way
, and making the survey experience more
 
enjoyable

and credible
.

4

Mission / Vision / VALUES

02
 
Valid Platform

V

O

T

L

Y

We strive to create a new community of young people capable of making

a difference and helping others through our values.

With the motto
 
VOTLY IS THE ANSWER
, we aim to become the primary

point for opinion polls worldwide.

In order to integrate all members of the community with us and to

motivate them to think and engage in the world of questionnaires, get used

to it, and even become addicted to it, We molded the concept to present it

in the form of
 
a social media platform
 
and created a new world of

influencers and content makers. (Polls Makers).

In an upscale Arab community, our unique platform will allow thousands of

people to willingly share their ideas and questions inside clean, moderated

content ideal for the entire family.

5

CLASSICAL METHODS OF POLLING

03

Face
-
to
-
Face Survey

It's no surprise that COST is considered a major

disadvantage in job interviews. An employee is one of the

highest costs a company can incur because he is.

Questionnaire by Phone

In addition to cost. You can't keep the customer on the

phone for 5
-
10 minutes at most. They then either hang up

or return an irrelevant answer.

Email Survey

Email surveys typically have a response rate of 3
-
15%.

However. Not sure if your email is getting to respondent's

inbox?

Group Questionnaires

1.
 
Implementation is expensive and requires a

geographical location.

2.
 
Participants are not free to express their opinions.

3.
 
It's hard to get candid opinions on sensitive issues.

4.
 
The results are usually biased.

5.
 
It may not accurately represent your target audience.

Paper Questionnaires

It is costly, difficult to produce results, and is not

environmentally friendly, requiring proofreading and clerical

work.

6

CURRENT PROBLEM

04

All classical methods of market research are proven to be failures.

Generally, you should spend about $20,000 to $50,000 for a qualitative or quantitative custom market

research project. In addition to Timeframes, recall and project cycles you will get an irrelevant audience

and inaccurate answers.

As a result, a large segment can not afford.

Small Businesses
 
Start
-
ups
 
Private Entrepreneurs

Professionals
 
University Students
 
Small Event Organizers

All are never able to afford doing market research before or during the implementation of their projects.

They enter the market as newcomers without market information, resulting in project failure.

7

VOTLY

05

IS THE ANSWER

We established a polling community to make polling easier and more enjoyable.

VOTLY community is created to replace past traditional survey techniques

with engaging, eye
-
catching, and short surveys accessible via the mobile app.

It is a sophisticated community
 
that
 
assists in gathering thoughts, sharing

them, creating polls and engagingly voting on them, and making the

polling experience more pleasurable and credible.

It enables our users to select the best niche for their polls and obtain

accurate results with industry insights without entering the market.

Easy Registration flow

08

User can
 
register by clicking on create an account. The user will

enter their phone number, and a pin code will be sent for

verification. Another way to register is by signing up with their

Facebook or Google accounts.

The
 
user will enter the following details to create their VOTLY

account.

•
 
First Name

•
 
Last Name

•
 
Password

Once the user logs in, they instantly receive
 
100
 
coins bonus.

They are provided with a starting balance
 
of 5000 XP.
 
The user

can then start exploring the VOTLY community.

12

Adding Polls:
 
Images
 
Text
 
Videos

09

•
 
The process of posting a poll is quick and straightforward. The publishers must follow the following steps and post the poll

online. The first step involves the user choosing the layout and images. The user can choose among 5 different designs

available on our platform and upload two to four pictures either from their phone’s camera roll or directly from their camera
.

•
 
Once
 
they have selected their desired layout and images, they can enter their poll question and select a category from the

list. The categories include Fashion, Technology, and Brands & Products. Users can also add relevant hashtags
.

•
 
The
 
user then reviews the information entered and chooses the number of votes. They can choose whether they want other

users to comment or BLAZE. Blazing a poll allows another user to share the poll under his name and increase the number of

voters. Blazed polls earn the poll author XP for every vote.

13

10

Votly’s Level
 
are given in exchange for
 
experience poins
 
gathered as the user levels up. Votly offers
 
six
 
levels for users.

Upon profile completion, users will start on the Starter level with
 
particular rewards
 
and level up accor ding to the
 
below.

User can upgraeded automatically once he collect the XPs or he purchase level with coins to speed up his level upgrdade

proccess.
 
The Benifets from upgrading level is to speed up coins gatharing and expand poll capacity.

User can get badge beside his name as per his current level.

14

Ambassador Level

11

If you are looking for excellence within the application
 
and get a premium

features, then you can subscribe to the ambassador level.

-
 
Priority for your questions to appear in discover section.

-
 
Special design for your comments.

-
 
1500 poll capacity.

-
 
Chat room under your name and moderation.

-
 
Communication with the app management using WhatsApp group which will

attend a periodical workshops with other ambassadors. And training sessions

about content creation.

-
 
Making great financial profit by getting 40% sales percentage on your ads

deals you make for the app.

-
 
The subscription cost for ambassador is: $300 / Annual

fulfil
 
the condition of the gift,

ation:

Frequently Asked Questions
What is Votly?

Votly is a social polling app that allows users to create, discover, and participate in AI-generated and user-created polls, fostering a community for sharing opinions and insights

How do I create a poll on Votly?

To create a poll, simply tap the "Plus" button within the app, choose your question type, enter your question and options, and customize your poll with images or other media.

How does the AI-generated content feature work?

Votly's AI-generated content feature converts news articles into interactive polls, providing fresh and engaging content for users to explore and discuss.

How does Votly's personalized feed algorithm work?

Votly uses an advanced algorithm to curate a personalized feed of user-generated and AI-generated polls based on your interests, activity, and interactions within the app.

How can I earn and redeem coins in Votly?

You can earn coins by participating in polls, and redeem them in the giveaway store for various rewards, adding a gamification element to your polling experience.

How do I share my polls with friends or on social media?

To share your polls, tap the "Share" icon on the poll and choose the desired platform or method to share it with friends, family, or on social media.

Can I use Votly for market research or other types of research?

Yes, Votly is a versatile platform ideal for market research, gathering customer feedback, identifying consumer preferences, and conducting various studies.

How does Votly ensure data privacy and security?

Votly takes data privacy and security seriously, implementing strong encryption and adhering to industry best practices to protect user data.

Is Votly available on both Android and iOS platforms?

Yes, Votly is available for download on both Android and iOS devices, ensuring a seamless experience across different platforms.

How can I contact Votly's support team if I have any issues or questions?
If you have any questions or issues, you can contact Votly's support team through the app's "Help" or "Contact Us" section, or by emailing them at support@votly.com
